mapper.select: select * from (select slctnNotiNo,orgnzNo,slctnNotiDstnct,cdNm, pCdNm, c.cd_Nm spCdNm from (select slctnNotiNo,orgnzNo,slctnNotiDstnct,cdNm, pCdNm, c.cd_Nm , c.PRNTS_CD_ID from (select noti.noti_no slctnNotiNo, noti.orgnz_no orgnzNo, noti.noti_dstnct slctnNotiDstnct, c.PRNTS_CD_ID, c.CD_NM cdNm, (select cd_nm from cd where cd_id = concat(substr(c.cd_id,1,1),'000000')) pCdNm from (select SLCTN_NOTI_NO noti_no, ORGNZ_NO orgnz_no, SLCTN_NOTI_DSTNCT noti_dstnct from slctn_noti) noti, cd c, slctn_noti_info noti_cd where noti.noti_no = noti_cd.SLCTN_NOTI_NO and noti_cd.cd_id = c.cd_id)sn Left outer join cd c on sn.PRNTS_CD_ID = c.cd_id)sn2 left outer join cd c on sn2.PRNTS_CD_ID = c.cd_id)sn where sn.pCdNm = #{type} order by sn.slctnNotiNo;

select * from (select orgnz_full_nm slctnTitle, orgnz_no as slctnNotiNo, '기관' as slctnNotiDstnct from organz union select concat(ifnull(wrtbt_title,''),' ',ifnull(wrtbt_text,'')) text, wrtbt_no as no, '게시글' as 구분 from wetbt union select concat(o.orgnz_full_nm,' ',s.slctn_title) text, s.slctn_noti_no as no, s.SLCTN_NOTI_DSTNCT as 구분 from slctn_noti s, organz o where s.orgnz_no=o.orgnz_no) search where search.slctnTitle like '%${_parameter}%'
